amendment.description: Page 3, line 17, strike ";and" and insert ", other than an excepted consent decree or settlement agreement;". Page 4, line 4, strike the period and insert "; and". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-363 to call for exception for consent decrees or settlement agreements relating to the enforcement of civil rights laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Conyers.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
